name: Elastic Fantastic
description:
.

Elastic Fantastic is a very difficult physics-platformer with a challenging game mechanic.
Use the unique elastic tie to connect to the floating rocks and fly yourself to the end!
You start with 60 lives so make them count.
Winning this game is a mountain of a task, only to be completed by the truly stubborn of heart and the most skilled of the gamers.

Watch out for the enemies!
